00057 /* so when we type - the view scrolls to the bottom */
00058 static void console_scroll_bottom(ARegion *ar)
00059 {
00060     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00061     v2d->cur.ymin = 0.0;
00062     v2d->cur.ymax = (float)v2d->winy;
00063 }

00065 static void console_textview_update_rect(SpaceConsole *sc, ARegion *ar)
00066 {
00067     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00068 
00069     UI_view2d_totRect_set(v2d, ar->winx - 1, console_textview_height(sc, ar));
00070 }

00072 static void console_select_offset(SpaceConsole *sc, const int offset)
00073 {
00074     sc->sel_start += offset;
00075     sc->sel_end += offset;
00076 }

00078 void console_history_free(SpaceConsole *sc, ConsoleLine *cl)
00079 {
00080     BLI_remlink(&sc->history, cl);
00081     MEM_freeN(cl->line);
00082     MEM_freeN(cl);
00083 }
00084 void console_scrollback_free(SpaceConsole *sc, ConsoleLine *cl)
00085 {
00086     BLI_remlink(&sc->scrollback, cl);
00087     MEM_freeN(cl->line);
00088     MEM_freeN(cl);
00089 }
00090 
00091 static void console_scrollback_limit(SpaceConsole *sc)
00092 {
00093     int tot;
00094     
00095     if (U.scrollback < 32) U.scrollback = 256;  // XXX - save in user defaults
00096     
00097     for (tot = BLI_countlist(&sc->scrollback); tot > U.scrollback; tot--)
00098         console_scrollback_free(sc, sc->scrollback.first);
00099 }
00100 
00101 static ConsoleLine *console_history_find(SpaceConsole *sc, const char *str, ConsoleLine *cl_ignore)
00102 {
00103     ConsoleLine *cl;
00104 
00105     for (cl = sc->history.last; cl; cl = cl->prev) {
00106         if (cl == cl_ignore)
00107             continue;
00108 
00109         if (strcmp(str, cl->line) == 0)
00110             return cl;
00111     }
00112 
00113     return NULL;
00114 }
00115 
00116 /* return 0 if no change made, clamps the range */
00117 static int console_line_cursor_set(ConsoleLine *cl, int cursor)
00118 {
00119     int cursor_new;
00120 
00121     if      (cursor < 0) cursor_new = 0;
00122     else if (cursor > cl->len) cursor_new = cl->len;
00123     else cursor_new = cursor;
00124     
00125     if (cursor_new == cl->cursor) {
00126         return FALSE;
00127     }
00128     
00129     cl->cursor = cursor_new;
00130     return TRUE;
00131 }

00154 static ConsoleLine *console_lb_add__internal(ListBase *lb, ConsoleLine *from)
00155 {
00156     ConsoleLine *ci = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ConsoleLine), "ConsoleLine Add");
00157     
00158     if (from) {
00159         ci->line = BLI_strdup(from->line);
00160         ci->len = strlen(ci->line);
00161         ci->len_alloc = ci->len;
00162         
00163         ci->cursor = from->cursor;
00164         ci->type = from->type;
00165     }
00166     else {
00167         ci->line = MEM_callocN(64, "console-in-line");
00168         ci->len_alloc = 64;
00169         ci->len = 0;
00170     }
00171     
00172     BLI_addtail(lb, ci);
00173     return ci;
00174 }

00176 static ConsoleLine *console_history_add(const bContext *C, ConsoleLine *from)
00177 {
00178     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00179     
00180     return console_lb_add__internal(&sc->history, from);
00181 }

00192 static ConsoleLine *console_lb_add_str__internal(ListBase *lb, char *str, int own)
00193 {
00194     ConsoleLine *ci = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ConsoleLine), "ConsoleLine Add");
00195     if (own) ci->line = str;
00196     else ci->line = BLI_strdup(str);
00197     
00198     ci->len = ci->len_alloc = strlen(str);
00199     
00200     BLI_addtail(lb, ci);
00201     return ci;
00202 }
00203 ConsoleLine *console_history_add_str(SpaceConsole *sc, char *str, int own)
00204 {
00205     return console_lb_add_str__internal(&sc->history, str, own);
00206 }
00207 ConsoleLine *console_scrollback_add_str(SpaceConsole *sc, char *str, int own)
00208 {
00209     ConsoleLine *ci = console_lb_add_str__internal(&sc->scrollback, str, own);
00210     console_select_offset(sc, ci->len + 1);
00211     return ci;
00212 }

00214 ConsoleLine *console_history_verify(const bContext *C)
00215 {
00216     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00217     ConsoleLine *ci = sc->history.last;
00218     if (ci == NULL)
00219         ci = console_history_add(C, NULL);
00220     
00221     return ci;
00222 }

00225 static void console_line_verify_length(ConsoleLine *ci, int len)
00226 {
00227     /* resize the buffer if needed */
00228     if (len >= ci->len_alloc) {
00229         int new_len = len * 2; /* new length */
00230         char *new_line = MEM_callocN(new_len, "console line");
00231         memcpy(new_line, ci->line, ci->len);
00232         MEM_freeN(ci->line);
00233         
00234         ci->line = new_line;
00235         ci->len_alloc = new_len;
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 static int console_line_insert(ConsoleLine *ci, char *str)
00240 {
00241     int len = strlen(str);
00242     
00243     if (len > 0 && str[len - 1] == '\n') { /* stop new lines being pasted at the end of lines */
00244         str[len - 1] = '\0';
00245         len--;
00246     }
00247 
00248     if (len == 0)
00249         return 0;
00250     
00251     console_line_verify_length(ci, len + ci->len);
00252     
00253     memmove(ci->line + ci->cursor + len, ci->line + ci->cursor, (ci->len - ci->cursor) + 1);
00254     memcpy(ci->line + ci->cursor, str, len);
00255     
00256     ci->len += len;
00257     ci->cursor += len;
00258     
00259     return len;
00260 }

00264 /* similar to the text editor, with some not used. keep compatible */
00265 static EnumPropertyItem console_move_type_items[] = {
00266     {LINE_BEGIN, "LINE_BEGIN", 0, "Line Begin", ""},
00267     {LINE_END, "LINE_END", 0, "Line End", ""},
00268     {PREV_CHAR, "PREVIOUS_CHARACTER", 0, "Previous Character", ""},
00269     {NEXT_CHAR, "NEXT_CHARACTER", 0, "Next Character", ""},
00270     {PREV_WORD, "PREVIOUS_WORD", 0, "Previous Word", ""},
00271     {NEXT_WORD, "NEXT_WORD", 0, "Next Word", ""},
00272     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00273 };
00274 
00275 static int console_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00276 {
00277     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C);
00278     
00279     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00280     int done = 0;
00281     int pos;
00282     
00283     switch (type) {
00284         case LINE_BEGIN:
00285             pos = ci->cursor;
00286             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00287                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_PREV,
00288                                      STRCUR_JUMP_ALL);
00289             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00290             break;
00291         case LINE_END:
00292             pos = ci->cursor;
00293             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00294                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_NEXT,
00295                                      STRCUR_JUMP_ALL);
00296             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00297             break;
00298         case PREV_CHAR:
00299             pos = ci->cursor;
00300             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00301                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_PREV,
00302                                      STRCUR_JUMP_NONE);
00303             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00304             break;
00305         case NEXT_CHAR:
00306             pos = ci->cursor;
00307             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00308                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_NEXT,
00309                                      STRCUR_JUMP_NONE);
00310             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00311             break;
00312 
00313         /* - if the character is a delimiter then skip delimiters (including white space)
00314          * - when jump over the word */
00315         case PREV_WORD:
00316             pos = ci->cursor;
00317             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00318                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_PREV,
00319                                      STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
00320             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00321             break;
00322         case NEXT_WORD:
00323             pos = ci->cursor;
00324             BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00325                                      &pos, STRCUR_DIR_NEXT,
00326                                      STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
00327             done = console_line_cursor_set(ci, pos);
00328             break;
00329     }
00330     
00331     if (done) {
00332         ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00333         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00334 
00335         ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00336         console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00337     }
00338 
00339 
00340     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00341 }

00343 void CONSOLE_OT_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
00344 {
00345     /* identifiers */
00346     ot->name = "Move Cursor";
00347     ot->description = "Move cursor position";
00348     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_move";
00349     
00350     /* api callbacks */
00351     ot->exec = console_move_exec;
00352     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;
00353 
00354     /* properties */
00355     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", console_move_type_items, LINE_BEGIN, "Type", "Where to move cursor to");
00356 }
00357 
00358 #define TAB_LENGTH 4
00359 static int console_insert_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00360 {
00361     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00362     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00363     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C);
00364     char *str = RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, "text", NULL, 0);
00365     int len;
00366 
00367     // XXX, alligned tab key hack
00368     if (str[0] == '\t' && str[1] == '\0') {
00369         len = TAB_LENGTH - (ci->cursor % TAB_LENGTH);
00370         MEM_freeN(str);
00371         str = MEM_mallocN(len + 1, "insert_exec");
00372         memset(str, ' ', len);
00373         str[len] = '\0';
00374     }
00375 
00376     len = console_line_insert(ci, str);
00377     
00378     MEM_freeN(str);
00379     
00380     if (len == 0) {
00381         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00382     }
00383     else {
00384         console_select_offset(sc, len);
00385     }
00386 
00387     console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00388     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00389 
00390     console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00391 
00392     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00393 }
00394 
00395 static int console_insert_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00396 {
00397     // if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "text")) { /* always set from keymap XXX */
00398     if (!RNA_string_length(op->ptr, "text")) {
00399         /* if alt/ctrl/super are pressed pass through */
00400         if (event->ctrl || event->oskey) {
00401             return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00402         }
00403         else {
00404             char str[2];
00405             str[0] = event->ascii;
00406             str[1] = '\0';
00407 
00408             RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "text", str);
00409         }
00410     }
00411     return console_insert_exec(C, op);
00412 }

00420     ot->description = "Insert text at cursor position";
00421     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_insert";
00422

00425     ot->invoke = console_insert_invoke;
00426     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;
00427 
00428     /* properties */
00429     prop = RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "text", "", 0, "Text", "Text to insert at the cursor position");
00430     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_SKIP_SAVE);
00431 }

00434 static EnumPropertyItem console_delete_type_items[] = {
00435     {DEL_NEXT_CHAR, "NEXT_CHARACTER", 0, "Next Character", ""},
00436     {DEL_PREV_CHAR, "PREVIOUS_CHARACTER", 0, "Previous Character", ""},
00437     {DEL_NEXT_WORD, "NEXT_WORD", 0, "Next Word", ""},
00438     {DEL_PREV_WORD, "PREVIOUS_WORD", 0, "Previous Word", ""},
00439     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00440 };
00441 
00442 static int console_delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00443 {
00444     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00445     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00446     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C);
00447     int pos;
00448     int stride;
00449 
00450     const short type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00451     int done = 0;
00452     
00453     if (ci->len == 0) {
00454         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00455     }
00456     
00457     switch (type) {
00458         case DEL_NEXT_CHAR:
00459         case DEL_NEXT_WORD:
00460             if (ci->cursor < ci->len) {
00461                 pos = ci->cursor;
00462                 BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00463                                          &pos, STRCUR_DIR_NEXT,
00464                                          (type == DEL_NEXT_CHAR) ? STRCUR_JUMP_NONE : STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
00465                 stride = pos - ci->cursor;
00466                 if (stride) {
00467                     memmove(ci->line + ci->cursor, ci->line + ci->cursor + stride, (ci->len - ci->cursor) + 1);
00468                     ci->len -= stride;
00469                     done = 1;
00470                 }
00471             }
00472             break;
00473         case DEL_PREV_CHAR:
00474         case DEL_PREV_WORD:
00475             if (ci->cursor > 0) {
00476                 pos = ci->cursor;
00477                 BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(ci->line, ci->len,
00478                                          &pos, STRCUR_DIR_PREV,
00479                                          (type == DEL_PREV_CHAR) ? STRCUR_JUMP_NONE : STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
00480                 stride = ci->cursor - pos;
00481                 if (stride) {
00482                     ci->cursor -= stride; /* same as above */
00483                     memmove(ci->line + ci->cursor, ci->line + ci->cursor + stride, (ci->len - ci->cursor) + 1);
00484                     ci->len -= stride;
00485                     done = 1;
00486                 }
00487             }
00488             break;
00489     }
00490 
00491     if (!done) {
00492         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00493     }
00494     else {
00495         console_select_offset(sc, -1);
00496     }
00497 
00498     console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00499     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00500 
00501     console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00502     
00503     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00504 }

00508 {
00509     /* identifiers */
00510     ot->name = "Delete";
00511     ot->description = "Delete text by cursor position";
00512     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_delete";
00513     
00514     /* api callbacks */
00515     ot->exec = console_delete_exec;
00516     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;

00518     /* properties */

00520 }

00523 /* the python exec operator uses this */
00524 static int console_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00525 {
00526     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00527     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00528     
00529     short scrollback = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "scrollback");
00530     short history = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "history");
00531     
00532     /*ConsoleLine *ci= */ console_history_verify(C);
00533     
00534     if (scrollback) { /* last item in mistory */
00535         while (sc->scrollback.first)
00536             console_scrollback_free(sc, sc->scrollback.first);
00537     }
00538     
00539     if (history) {
00540         while (sc->history.first)
00541             console_history_free(sc, sc->history.first);
00542     }
00543 
00544     console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00545     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00546 
00547     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00548 }

00561     /* properties */
00562     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "scrollback", 1, "Scrollback", "Clear the scrollback history");

00564 }

00568 /* the python exec operator uses this */
00569 static int console_history_cycle_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00570 {
00571     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00572     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00573 
00574     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C); /* TODO - stupid, just prevernts crashes when no command line */
00575     short reverse = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "reverse"); /* assumes down, reverse is up */
00576     int prev_len = ci->len;
00577 
00578     /* keep a copy of the line above so when history is cycled
00579      * this is the only function that needs to know about the double-up */
00580     if (ci->prev) {
00581         ConsoleLine *ci_prev = (ConsoleLine *)ci->prev;
00582 
00583         if (strcmp(ci->line, ci_prev->line) == 0)
00584             console_history_free(sc, ci_prev);
00585     }
00586 
00587     if (reverse) { /* last item in mistory */
00588         ci = sc->history.last;
00589         BLI_remlink(&sc->history, ci);
00590         BLI_addhead(&sc->history, ci);
00591     }
00592     else {
00593         ci = sc->history.first;
00594         BLI_remlink(&sc->history, ci);
00595         BLI_addtail(&sc->history, ci);
00596     }
00597 
00598     {   /* add a duplicate of the new arg and remove all other instances */
00599         ConsoleLine *cl;
00600         while ((cl = console_history_find(sc, ci->line, ci)))
00601             console_history_free(sc, cl);
00602 
00603         console_history_add(C, (ConsoleLine *)sc->history.last);
00604     }
00605     
00606     ci = sc->history.last;
00607     console_select_offset(sc, ci->len - prev_len);
00608 
00609     /* could be wrapped so update scroll rect */
00610     console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00611     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00612 
00613     console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00614 
00615     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00616 }
00617 
00618 void CONSOLE_OT_history_cycle(wmOperatorType *ot)
00619 {
00620     /* identifiers */
00621     ot->name = "History Cycle";
00622     ot->description = "Cycle through history";
00623     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_history_cycle";
00624     
00625     /* api callbacks */
00626     ot->exec = console_history_cycle_exec;
00627     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;
00628     
00629     /* properties */
00630     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "reverse", 0, "Reverse", "Reverse cycle history");
00631 }
00632 
00633 
00634 /* the python exec operator uses this */
00635 static int console_history_append_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00636 {
00637     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00638     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00639     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00640     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C);
00641     char *str = RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, "text", NULL, 0); /* own this text in the new line, don't free */
00642     int cursor = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "current_character");
00643     short rem_dupes = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "remove_duplicates");
00644     int prev_len = ci->len;
00645 
00646     if (rem_dupes) {
00647         ConsoleLine *cl;
00648 
00649         while ((cl = console_history_find(sc, ci->line, ci)))
00650             console_history_free(sc, cl);
00651 
00652         if (strcmp(str, ci->line) == 0) {
00653             MEM_freeN(str);
00654             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00655         }
00656     }
00657 
00658     ci = console_history_add_str(sc, str, 1); /* own the string */
00659     console_select_offset(sc, ci->len - prev_len);
00660     console_line_cursor_set(ci, cursor);
00661 
00662     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00663 
00664     /* when calling render modally this can be NULL when calling:
00665      * bpy.ops.render.render('INVOKE_DEFAULT') */
00666     if (ar) {
00667         console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00668     }
00669 
00670     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00671 }
00672

00678     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_history_append";

00681     ot->exec = console_history_append_exec;
00682     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;

00685     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "text", "", 0, "Text", "Text to insert at the cursor position");   
00686     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "current_character", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Cursor", "The index of the cursor", 0, 10000);
00687     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "remove_duplicates", 0, "Remove Duplicates", "Remove duplicate items in the history");
00688 }

00691 /* the python exec operator uses this */
00692 static int console_scrollback_append_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00693 {
00694     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00695     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00696     ConsoleLine *ci;
00697     
00698     char *str = RNA_string_get_alloc(op->ptr, "text", NULL, 0); /* own this text in the new line, don't free */
00699     int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00700 
00701     console_history_verify(C);
00702     
00703     ci = console_scrollback_add_str(sc, str, 1); /* own the string */
00704     ci->type = type;
00705     
00706     console_scrollback_limit(sc);
00707 
00708     /* 'ar' can be null depending on the operator that runs
00709      * rendering with invoke default for eg causes this */
00710     if (ar) {
00711         console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00712     }
00713 
00714     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00715     
00716     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00717 }

00732     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_scrollback_append";

00743 
00744 static int console_copy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00745 {
00746     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00747 
00748     DynStr *buf_dyn = BLI_dynstr_new();
00749     char *buf_str;
00750     
00751     ConsoleLine *cl;
00752     int sel[2];
00753     int offset = 0;
00754 
00755     ConsoleLine cl_dummy = {NULL};
00756 
00757 #if 0
00758     /* copy whole file */
00759     for (cl = sc->scrollback.first; cl; cl = cl->next) {
00760         BLI_dynstr_append(buf_dyn, cl->line);
00761         BLI_dynstr_append(buf_dyn, "\n");
00762     }
00763 #endif
00764 
00765     if (sc->sel_start == sc->sel_end)
00766         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00767 
00768     console_scrollback_prompt_begin(sc, &cl_dummy);
00769 
00770     for (cl = sc->scrollback.first; cl; cl = cl->next) {
00771         offset += cl->len + 1;
00772     }
00773 
00774     if (offset == 0) {
00775         console_scrollback_prompt_end(sc, &cl_dummy);
00776         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00777     }
00778 
00779     offset -= 1;
00780     sel[0] = offset - sc->sel_end;
00781     sel[1] = offset - sc->sel_start;
00782 
00783     for (cl = sc->scrollback.first; cl; cl = cl->next) {
00784         if (sel[0] <= cl->len && sel[1] >= 0) {
00785             int sta = MAX2(sel[0], 0);
00786             int end = MIN2(sel[1], cl->len);
00787 
00788             if (BLI_dynstr_get_len(buf_dyn))
00789                 BLI_dynstr_append(buf_dyn, "\n");
00790 
00791             BLI_dynstr_nappend(buf_dyn, cl->line + sta, end - sta);
00792         }
00793 
00794         sel[0] -= cl->len + 1;
00795         sel[1] -= cl->len + 1;
00796     }
00797 
00798     buf_str = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(buf_dyn);
00799 
00800     BLI_dynstr_free(buf_dyn);
00801     WM_clipboard_text_set(buf_str, 0);
00802 
00803     MEM_freeN(buf_str);
00804 
00805     console_scrollback_prompt_end(sc, &cl_dummy);
00806 
00807     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00808 }
00809

00823 
00824 static int console_paste_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00825 {
00826     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00827     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00828     ConsoleLine *ci = console_history_verify(C);
00829 
00830     char *buf_str = WM_clipboard_text_get(0);
00831     char *buf_step, *buf_next;
00832 
00833     if (buf_str == NULL)
00834         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00835 
00836     buf_step = buf_str;
00837 
00838     while ((buf_next = buf_step) && buf_next[0] != '\0') {
00839         buf_step = strchr(buf_next, '\n');
00840         if (buf_step) {
00841             *buf_step = '\0';
00842             buf_step++;
00843         }
00844 
00845         if (buf_next != buf_str) {
00846             WM_operator_name_call(C, "CONSOLE_OT_execute", WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL);
00847             ci = console_history_verify(C);
00848         }
00849 
00850         console_select_offset(sc, console_line_insert(ci, buf_next));
00851     }
00852 
00853     MEM_freeN(buf_str);
00854 
00855     console_textview_update_rect(sc, ar);
00856     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00857 
00858     console_scroll_bottom(ar);
00859 
00860     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00861 }
00862

00874     /* properties */
00875 }
00876 
00877 typedef struct SetConsoleCursor {
00878     int sel_old[2];
00879     int sel_init;
00880 } SetConsoleCursor;
00881 
00882 // TODO, cursor placement without selection
00883 static void console_cursor_set_to_pos(SpaceConsole *sc, ARegion *ar, SetConsoleCursor *scu, int mval[2], int UNUSED(sel))
00884 {
00885     int pos;
00886     pos = console_char_pick(sc, ar, mval);
00887 
00888     if (scu->sel_init == INT_MAX) {
00889         scu->sel_init = pos;
00890         sc->sel_start = sc->sel_end = pos;
00891         return;
00892     }
00893 
00894     if (pos < scu->sel_init) {
00895         sc->sel_start = pos;
00896         sc->sel_end = scu->sel_init;
00897     }
00898     else if (pos > sc->sel_start) {
00899         sc->sel_start = scu->sel_init;
00900         sc->sel_end = pos;
00901     }
00902     else {
00903         sc->sel_start = sc->sel_end = pos;
00904     }
00905 }
00906 
00907 static void console_modal_select_apply(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00908 {
00909     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00910     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00911     SetConsoleCursor *scu = op->customdata;
00912     int mval[2];
00913     int sel_prev[2];
00914 
00915     mval[0] = event->mval[0];
00916     mval[1] = event->mval[1];
00917 
00918     sel_prev[0] = sc->sel_start;
00919     sel_prev[1] = sc->sel_end;
00920     
00921     console_cursor_set_to_pos(sc, ar, scu, mval, TRUE);
00922 
00923     /* only redraw if the selection changed */
00924     if (sel_prev[0] != sc->sel_start || sel_prev[1] != sc->sel_end) {
00925         ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00926     }
00927 }
00928 
00929 static void console_cursor_set_exit(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00930 {
00931 //  SpaceConsole *sc= CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00932     SetConsoleCursor *scu = op->customdata;
00933 
00934 #if 0
00935     if (txt_has_sel(text)) {
00936         buffer = txt_sel_to_buf(text);
00937         WM_clipboard_text_set(buffer, 1);
00938         MEM_freeN(buffer);
00939     }
00940 #endif
00941 
00942     MEM_freeN(scu);
00943 }
00944 
00945 static int console_modal_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00946 {
00947     SpaceConsole *sc = CTX_wm_space_console(C);
00948 //  ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00949     SetConsoleCursor *scu;
00950 
00951     op->customdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SetConsoleCursor), "SetConsoleCursor");
00952     scu = op->customdata;
00953 
00954     scu->sel_old[0] = sc->sel_start;
00955     scu->sel_old[1] = sc->sel_end;
00956 
00957     scu->sel_init = INT_MAX;
00958 
00959     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00960 
00961     console_modal_select_apply(C, op, event);
00962 
00963     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00964 }
00965 
00966 static int console_modal_select(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00967 {
00968     switch (event->type) {
00969         case LEFTMOUSE:
00970         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
00971         case RIGHTMOUSE:
00972             console_cursor_set_exit(C, op);
00973             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00974         case MOUSEMOVE:
00975             console_modal_select_apply(C, op, event);
00976             break;
00977     }
00978 
00979     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00980 }
00981 
00982 static int console_modal_select_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00983 {
00984     console_cursor_set_exit(C, op);
00985     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00986 }
00987 
00988 void CONSOLE_OT_select_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
00989 {
00990     /* identifiers */
00991     ot->name = "Set Selection";
00992     ot->idname = "CONSOLE_OT_select_set";
00993     ot->description = "Set the console selection";
00994 
00995     /* api callbacks */
00996     ot->invoke = console_modal_select_invoke;
00997     ot->modal = console_modal_select;
00998     ot->cancel = console_modal_select_cancel;
00999     ot->poll = ED_operator_console_active;
01000 }
